mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ms.match_id AS match_id, ms.date AS date, ms.time AS time, ht.team_name AS home_team_name, at.team_name AS away_team_name, ms.location AS location FROM favorite_team ft JOIN match_schedule ms ON ft.team_id = ms.hometeam_id OR ft.team_id = ms.awayteam_id LEFT JOIN sport_team ht ON ms.hometeam_id = ht.team_id LEFT JOIN sport_team at ON ms.awayteam_id = at.team_id WHERE ft.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_schedule (match_id, sport_name, date, time, home_team_id, away_team_id, location) VALUES (#{matchId}, #{sportName}, #{date}, #{time}, #{homeTeamId}, #{awayTeamId}, #{location})
mapper.update: UPDATE match_schedule SET sport_name = #{sportName}, date = #{date}, time = #{time}, home_team_id = #{homeTeamId}, away_team_id = #{awayTeamId}, location = #{location} WHERE match_id = #{matchId}
